channel.title: Rise with Skye Mendes
channel.managingEditor: rise@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Skye Mendes | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
channel.description:
Feel Look Do Incredible

Be confident and dress with purpose. Change is possible. You are worthy. You are beautiful. You are enough. We need the special gift only YOU have to share with this world.

Style is an inward-outward process that encompasses and shows off every aspect of who you are: your skills, values, beliefs, personality, and heart. It’s your message to the world about who you are and what you stand for. Through Skye's signature 8-step process you'll discover and create a Style Fingerprint that aligns uniquely to who you are, your lifestyle, goals, and desires. You’ll discover your beautiful uniqueness and be motivated to live and embrace it. Discover the personal brand called YOU – Your unique superpower,

Another Solid Gold Podcast https://SolidGold.co.za #BeHeard
channel.itunes:subtitle: Discover the personal brand called YOU – Your unique superpower,

item.author: rise@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Skye Mendes | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Skye Mendes | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: 5 Elements why YOU are irreplaceable
item.itunes:title: 5 Elements why YOU are irreplaceable
item.itunes:subtitle: Your Brand - Your Superpower
item.description:
5 Elements why YOU are irreplaceable In this episode we focus on what Personal Branding is, and discuss the basics. We are so busy taking information in from social media and other online platforms that it can become overwhelming and we also loose our true core selves if we are consistently looking outside ourselves for acceptance and approval. Impactful personal brands have undergone great introspection and self-awareness. It’s how you distinguish yourself from others. Just like your fingerprint, there is noone else like you on this planet. That is your gift and superpower.

Music : Audiosome | Upbeat Fashion Lounge


Connect with Skye on her website and change your life https://skyemendes.com/


When you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
